EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_PsyPower: This knight has [g:+{psyPower}%] [b:Focus], increasing his chance to trigger Afflictions and Autos.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_Resistance: This knight has [g:+{resistanceAmount}%] [b:Resistance].  Resistance gives a chance to cancel Afflictions.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_WP: This knight has [g:+{willpowerAmount}] Max WP.  [b:Willpower] is used for active abilities.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AP: This knight gains [g:+{numAP}] AP every turn.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_PassiveEquipmentSlo: This knight has an extra [b:Passive Equipment Slot].
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ArmourBreak: This weapon has {instantEffect}.  Affected targets lose [b:Armour] on hit.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_Knockback: The target is pushed backwards from its current position.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmuneDrained: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Drained]).  He will not lose [b:WP] from enemy attacks.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmuneHazards: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Hazards]).  He will not suffer DMG from Hazards.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmuneImmobilized: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Immobilized]).  He cannot be affected by this Affliction.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmuneHobbled: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Hobbled]).  He cannot be affected by this Affliction.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmunePinned: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Pinned]).  He cannot be affected by this Affliction.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmunePlague: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Plague]).  He cannot be affected by this Affliction.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ImmuneWeakened: This knight has Immunity to ([b:Weakened]).  He cannot be affected by this Affliction.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_WarpSuppression: This knight does not increase [b:Warp Surge] when using Psychic Abilities.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_Anchored: This knight ignores [b:DMG] penalties from [b:Distance] for their [b:Ranged Weapons].
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_Penitent: When their [b:WP] is [g:0], this Knight spends their [b:HP] instead of [b:WP].
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoParry: When struck with a Melee Attack, this knight has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to cancel it.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoFirstStrike: If an enemy moves adjacent to this knight, he has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to strike automatically.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoAegisReaction: This knight has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to trigger [b:Aegis Shield] at the end of their turn.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoRighteous: When this knight CRITS a target with a Melee Attack he has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to gain [g:+{abilityAP}] AP.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoSnapFire: When this knight CRITS a target with a Ranged Attack he has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to gain [g:+{abilityAP}] AP.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoIronWill: When activating a [b:Force Strike] this Knight has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to gain [g:+{abilityWP}] WP.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoFortitude: When activating a [b:Psybolt] this Knight has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to gain [g:+{abilityWP}] WP.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoExecutioner: When this knight [b:Executes] a target, he gains [g:+{abilityAP}] AP.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoInspired: When this knight [b:Executes] a target, all Knights gain [g:+{abilityWP}] WP.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoRapidReload: When this knight's Ammo reaches 0, he has a [g:{autoChance}%] chance to [b:Reload].
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_AutoUsesAll: This knight gains [g:+{autoUses}] Use / Turn for all their [b:Auto] Abilities.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeDamage: Activate to add [g:+{abilityBonusDamage}] DMG to this Melee Attack.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeDamageBo: This knight has [g:+{abilityBonusDamage}] DMG for their [b:Force Strikes] with [b:Melee Weapons].
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeCrit: Activate to gain [g:+{abilityBonusCrit}%] CRIT to this Melee Attack.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeAfflict: Activate to {statusEffect} with your Melee Attack.  {statusEffectDescription}
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeArmourPi: Activate to add [b:Armour Pierce] to this Melee Attack.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeArmourBr: Activate to add Armour Break [g:{abilityArmourBreakBonus}] to this Melee Attack.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ForceStrikeStun: Activate to add [g:+{abilityStunBonus}] [b:Stun] to this Melee Attack.

EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_Overwatch: Set a Hazard Zone over Arc [g:{coneAngle}] at Range [g:{overwatchRange}].  Shoot any Enemy acting in that zone.  Ends Turn.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_OverwatchDamage: This Knight's Overwatch Ability gains [g:+{overwatchDamage}] DMG per shot.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_ScatterShot: Target a Spread Attack over Arc [g:{abilityAngle}] at Range [g:{abilityRange}] and deal [g:+{bonusDamage}] DMG per [g:2] Ammo.  Depletes [g:All] Ammo.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_DisruptShot: Activate to add {abilityStatusEffect} to this Ranged Attack.
EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_PsychicOnslaught: Activate to add a Blast over Area [g:{abilityRadius}] that deals [g:{abilityAoEDamage}] DMG.  [b:No Stun].

EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_DefendPosition: Gain [g:+{abilityArmour}] Armour.  Set a Zone over Area [g:{abilityAutoRadius}] for [g:1] Turn.  Deal [g:{abilityAutoDamage}] DMG to Enemies approaching Allies in the zone.  [b:Knockback].

EQUIPMENT_BONUS_DESC_TacticalDreadnought: This knight is immune to [b:Knockback] effects from enemies of equal size.

IC_FragGrenade_Description: Target a [b:Blast Attack] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] to deal [g:{damage}] DMG.
IC_KrakGrenade_Description: Target a [b:Blast Attack] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] to deal [g:{damage}] DMG.
IC_BlindGrenade_Description: Target a [b:Blast Hazard] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] for [g:{effectDuration}] Turn(s).  [b:Smoke].
IC_PsykOutGrenade_Description: Target a [b:Blast Attack] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] to deal [g:{damage}] DMG.
IC_PsychotrokeGrenade_Description: Target a [b:Blast Attack] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] to deal [g:{damage}] DMG.
IC_EmpyreanBrainMine_Description: Target a [b:Blast Attack] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] to deal [g:{damage}] DMG.
IC_SeekerSkull_Description: Move to a target location within Range [g:{range}] and reveal enemies within Area [g:{skullSightRange}].
IC_MedicaeSkull_Description: Target a Knight at Range [g:{range}] to {instantEffect}.  They will recover [g:{healAmount}] HP immediately.
IC_HailerSkull_Description: Target a [b:Blast Attack] at Range [g:{range}] over Area [g:{radius}] to {statusEffect}.  This Skull has [g:{skullHP}] Max HP.
IC_ExtractorServoSkull_Description: Target an Enemy at Range [g:{range}].  [b:Extract Seeds].
IC_DisruptorServoSkull_Description: Target an Enemy at Range [g:{range}].  Deals [g:{damage}] DMG. [b: Armour Pierce]
IC_ApothecarionSkull_Description: All [b:Biomancy] Abilities can be used at Long Range.
IC_UnguentsOfWarding_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{resistanceAmount}%] [b:Resistance], which increases their chance to prevent a negative Affliction.
IC_LiberDaemonicaPerfectus_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{critDamage}] CRIT DMG for their [b:Melee Attacks].
IC_BlessedGreaves_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{critChance}%] CRIT for their [b:Ranged Attacks].
IC_SancticShard_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{psyPower}%] [b:Focus], which increases their chance to trigger [b:Autos] and cause Afflictions.
IC_AuguriumScrolls_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{critChance}%] CRIT for their [b:Melee Attacks].
IC_ExtendedMagazine_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{ammoBonus}] Ammo for their [b:Ranged Weapons].
IC_PuritySealOfPrecision_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{rangeBonus}] Range for their [b:Ranged Weapons].
IC_RangedCritDmg_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{critDamage}] CRIT DMG for their [b:Ranged Attacks].
IC_DominaLiberDaemonica_Description: This Knight gains [g:+{critDamage}] CRIT DMG and [g:+{critChance}%] CRIT for their [b:Melee Attacks].
WC_Halberd_Description: The Halberd is a [b:Melee Weapons] used by all Knights.  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_Falchions_Description: The Falchions are [b:Melee Weapons] used by all Knights.  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_Narthecium_Description: The Narthecium is a [b:Melee Weapon] only available to the Apothecary.  It unlocks access to unique abilities.
WC_DaemonHammer_Description: The Daemon Hammer is a [b:Melee Weapon] used by all Knights.  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_WardingStave_Description: The Warding Stave is a [b:Melee Weapon] used by all Knights.  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_Crozius_Description: The [b:Crozius Arcanum] is a [b:Melee Weapon] only available to the [b:Chaplain].  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_StormBolter_Description: The Storm Bolter is the Grey Knight’s standard [b:Ranged Weapon].
WC_Psycannon_Description: The [b:Psycannon] is a [b:Special Weapon].  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_Psilencer_Description: The [b:Psilencer] is a [b:Special Weapon].  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
WC_Incinerator_Description: The [b:Incinerator] is a [b:Special Weapon].  This category unlocks unique upgrades for this class.
EQUIPMENT_CLASS_TYPE_DESC_Ranged: Grey Knights can equip a variety of [b:Ranged Weapons].  Upgrades here affect all of them.
EQUIPMENT_CLASS_TYPE_DESC_Melee: Nemesis Force Weapons are the mainstay of the Grey Knights arsenal.  Upgrades here affect all [b:Melee Weapons].
EQUIPMENT_CLASS_TYPE_DESC_Grenade: [b:Grenades] provide limited Ammo attacks for your Knights. You can equip one [b:Grenade] type per Wargear slot.
EQUIPMENT_CLASS_TYPE_DESC_Skull: Servo Skulls provide limited use specialized abilities for your Grey Knight.  You can equip one Servo Skull per wargear slot.
EQUIPMENT_ALREADY_EQUIPPED_DESCRIPTION: Item {0} is already equipped on {1}, it will be unequipped if you proceed.
EQUIPMENT_DETAIL_DESC_Smoke: All [b:Ranged Attacks] targeted from or into this [b:Hazard] deal [g:-4] DMG.
EQUIPMENT_DETAIL_DESC_EnragedSkull: While Afflicted, the target will only attack this Skull.
EQUIPMENT_DETAIL_DESC_ExtractSeeds: This Skull will [b:Extract Seeds], collecting all [b:Bloom Seeds] from the target.
